stepAnswer: click file, open the Backstage view, then Options; click Formulas and check "error checking rules"
stepTitle: How do you enable background formula checking to review the workbook for errors in formulas?
choices: click file, open the Backstage view, then Options; click Formulas and check "error checking rules"
click file, open the Backstage view, then Options; click Formulas and check "tracing errors"
